title: Are GMC Azamgarh and GMC Banda good and reputable colleges? - Quora

response.answer_text: No they are not that much reputed moreover they dont have their educational facilities comparable to other old medical colleges of state such as KGMU GSVM MLN SNMC…However their infrastructure is good as its new. However in terms of faculties and education GGMC AZAMGARH can be preferred over GMC BANDA But if you are going for mbbs their no nead to worry because development is fast and in forthcoming years they will be in far better position. Gud luck…

I can only tell about GMC aZamgarh . Well it's a good college to take but it's not reputed much becouse it's new and only single batch has completed mbbs till now . Although no problem regarding any facility or faculty with respect to college . The college is 23 kms out of city and there is little communication problem , rest everything is fine ! Library , OPD, good clinical exposure !
